snippet: The implant is the first to generate an intermittent electrical pulse that blocks nerve signals from the brain to the stomach, reducing hunger pangs.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration approves surgically implanted device to treat obesity in some adults; device emits electrical pulse that blocks nerve signals to the stomach, cutting hunger pangs.
lead_paragraph: The implant is the first to generate an intermittent electrical pulse that blocks nerve signals from the brain to the stomach, reducing hunger pangs.

headline.main: F.D.A. Approves Surgical Implant to Treat Obesity
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Approves Surgical Implant to Treat Obesity
